translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I received oral orders from His Excellency Señor Bento Manuel Ribeiro to send the prisoner Sezefredo Nunes to the brigade under Your Lordship, Captain Fortunato Francisco da Silva, to perform his duty in the forces of the 2nd and 3rd districts, appointed by Your Lordship Brigadier Bento Manuel to go to the province of Corrientes to deal with Lope Chico on political matters. The same captain says that there are 50 horses of his consignment waiting for orders from Your Lordship Your Lordship Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship

Barracks in Alegrete, December 16, 1837.

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Colonel Commander of the Right Division. José Inácio da Silva Abreu, Lieutenant Colonel Interim Commander of the Frontier.

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Colonel Commander of the Right Division. From the Lieutenant Colonel Interim Commander of the Frontier. Responded.
